entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Collins Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:29 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.0°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 33.
